delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: This action is irreversible. Entity and related records won't be recoverable once deleted!

unsaved.title: Unsaved changes
unsaved.description: You have unsaved changes. Save to persist changes otherwise you can discard message.

login.description: Login to your account to access the application

passwordReset.heading: Forgot Your Password?
passwordReset.description: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.

passwordResetCode.heading: Verification code
passwordResetCode.description: A verification code was sent to

otp.label: Password reset verification code
otp.description: Please enter the verification code sent to your email.

passwordResetConfirm.heading: New password
passwordResetConfirm.description: Enter new password and confirm changes before proceeding.

form.description: Provide required information and save when done

create.title: New label
create.description: Fill in the inputs and click save when you're done.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: This action is irreversible. User and related records won't be recoverable once deleted!

unsaved.title: Unsaved changes
unsaved.description: You have unsaved changes. Save to persist changes otherwise you can discard message.

info.heading: Primary information
info.description: This section includes the main fields required to create a new user.

firstName.label: First name
firstName.description: Provide a valid first name to identify user.

middleName.label: Middle name
middleName.description: Provide user's middle name if any.

lastName.label: Last name
lastName.description: Provide a valid last name to identify user.

email.label: Email
email.description: Email must be unique. This will be the user's main key of identification.

password.label: Password
password.description: Provice a user's password with length greater than 6.

phone.label: Phone
phone.description: Even though this field is not required, it is recommended!

labels.label: Labels
labels.description: Assign labels to the user (e.g. admin, employee, ...) Labels helps us better classify the user in order to grant/limit access to services.

isActive.label: Is active
isActive.description: Modify user's access to all services. If inactive we will block immediate access.

isAdmin.label: Is admin
isAdmin.description: User with this marked as admin is granted access to all services regardless of the roles.

isSuperAdmin.label: Is super admin
isSuperAdmin.description: This is highest access level a user can obtained. They'll be able to manage everything including deleting other admins.

roles.heading: Assigned roles
roles.description: On this section, you can access lists of available roles and assign/unassign them to user's as needed.

label.heading: New label
label.description: Fill in the inputs and click save when you're done.

name.label: Name
name.description: Give context on what this permission views or modifies

desc.label: Description
desc.description: Give context to help labels understand this permission and the effect it will have

form.description: Provide required information and save when done

info.heading: Primary information
info.description: This section includes the main fields required to create a new application.

clientId.label: Client Id
clientId.description: This is a read-only unique identifier needed while completing the auth flow.

secretId.label: Secret Id
secretId.description: Secret is read-only. We generate it upon creation of a new application.

name.label: Name
name.description: This field is fully representational. This is what the user will see.

domain.label: Domain
domain.description: Where can be find this application?

desc.label: Description
desc.description: Explain in a few words the purpose of this application.

callbackUrls.heading: Callback URLs
callbackUrls.description: This section includes everything needed for the auth flow

applicationHomepageURI.label: Application homepage URI
applicationHomepageURI.description: The homepage link to your application. E.g. https://app.yourapp.com. Opens on logo-click and for other back link actions.

applicationLoginURI.label: Application login URI
applicationLoginURI.description: The default login route for resolving session issues. Allows users to redirect back to the application sign-in page via the /auth endpoint. E.g. https://app.yourapp.com/api/auth/login

allowedCallbackURL.label: Allowed callback URL
allowedCallbackURL.description: These are the redirect URIs where the user can be sent after authenticating. Add each URL on a new line.

allowedLogoutRedirectURLs.label: Allowed logout redirect URLs
allowedLogoutRedirectURLs.description: These are the URLs where the user can be sent after signing out. Add each URL on a new line.

tokens.heading: Tokens
tokens.description: Tokens are a way for apps to perform authorization and authentication processes without needing the user to re-enter their credentials.
tokens.howDoesTokenExpiryWorksDescription: Define how long tokens last before they need to be re-issued or refreshed. 3,600 seconds = 1 hour and 86,400 seconds = 1 day.

IdTokenExpiry.label: ID token expiry
IdTokenExpiry.description: ID tokens confirm user authentication and contain basic user profile data

accessTokenExpiry.label: Access token expiry
accessTokenExpiry.description: Access tokens confirm the app has been authorized. Use these to call an API or check if the client has access to a resource.

refreshTokenExpiry.label: Refresh token expiry
refreshTokenExpiry.description: Refresh tokens let the app get new access tokens without having to ask your users to log in again

permissions.heading: Application Permissions
permissions.description: List and/or add permissions (action:resource) to application.

table.empty: There're nothing here. Add your first permission!

dialog.title: New permission
dialog.description: Fill in the inputs and click save when you're done.

key.label: Key
key.description: Define how this key will be referenced in code

name.label: Name
name.description: Give context on what this permission views or modifies

description.label: Description
description.description: Give context to help users understand this permission and the effect it will have

form.description: Provide required information and save when done

info.heading: Primary information
info.description: This section includes the main fields required to create a new role.

name.label: Name
name.description: This field is fully representational. This is what the user will see.

desc.label: Description
desc.description: Explain in a few words the purpose of this application.

policies.heading: Application Policies
policies.description: This section set-ups the access rules/policies for the associated application and its permissions.
